  40. /* is the minor heap full or an external interrupt has been triggered */
  41. ‌Caml_inline int caml_check_gc_interrupt(caml_domain_state * dom_st)
  42. {
  43.   CAMLalloc_point_here;
  44.   uintnat young_limit = atomic_load_relaxed(&dom_st->young_limit);
  45.   if ((uintnat)dom_st->young_ptr < young_limit) {
  46.     /* Synchronise for the case when [young_limit] was used to interrupt
  47.        us. */
  48.     atomic_thread_fence(memory_order_acquire);
  49.     return 1;
  50.   }
  51.   return 0;
  52. }

  54. ‌#define Caml_check_gc_interrupt(dom_st)           \
  55.   (CAMLunlikely(caml_check_gc_interrupt(dom_st)))

  93. ‌Caml_inline intnat caml_domain_alone(void)
  94. {
  95.   return atomic_load_acquire(&caml_num_domains_running) == 1;
  96. }
